metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31150 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. It is possible to inject CRLF sequences into request headers in undici in versions less than 5.7.1. A fix was released in version 5.8.0. Sanitizing all HTTP headers from untrusted sources to eliminate `\r\n` is a workaround for this issue.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
